sentences.chinese: 十二大餘三十九，小餘一百四十四；
sentences.literal: Twelve large remainder thirty nine, small remainder one hundred forty four;
Large remainder fifty six, small remainder eight;
Zhu Li Da Yuan Xian third year.

sentences.chinese: 閏十三大餘三十三，小餘四百九十二；
sentences.literal: Intercalary thirteen large remainder thirty three, small remainder four hundred ninety two;
Large remainder one, small remainder sixteen;
Shang Heng Kun Dun fourth year.

sentences.chinese: 十二大餘五十七，小餘三百九十九；
sentences.literal: Twelve large remainder fifty seven, small remainder three hundred ninety nine;
Large remainder six, small remainder twenty four;
Zhao Yang Chi Fen Ruo Wu Feng first year.

sentences.chinese: 閏十三大餘五十一，小餘七百四十七；
sentences.literal: Intercalary thirteen large remainder fifty one, small remainder seven hundred forty seven;
Large remainder twelve, no small remainder;

sentences.chinese: 十二大餘十五，小餘六百五十四；
sentences.literal: Twelve large remainder fifteen, small remainder six hundred fifty four;
Large remainder seventeen, small remainder eight;
Shang Zhang Shan E third year.
